caption: Trait
description: Describes a characteristic or feature of an entity that was observed.
name: trait

category.description: The high-level grouping or classification this trait belongs to.

rank.description: The numeric rank of the trait. This value can be used to sort and prioritize traits within the array attribute traits. Higher values indicate higher priority/importance.

type.description: The type of the trait. Example, contributing, mitigating or contextual.

uid.description: The unique identifier for the trait.
